location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市西城区成方街32号
location.en: 32 Chengfang Street, Xicheng District, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行，亦是国务院组成部门之一。主要职责是拟订金融业改革和发展战略规划、制定和执行货币政策、汇率政策，承担最后贷款人的责任等。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China, and one of the constituent departments of the State Council. Its main responsibilities include drafting financial industry reform and development strategic plans, formulating and implementing monetary and exchange rate policies, and acting as the lender of last resort.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国人民银行行长、党委书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Governor and Party Committee Secretary of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国人民银行副行长、国家外汇管理局局长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as a Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China and Administrator of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国人民银行副行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as a Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国人民银行副行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as a Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国人民银行副行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as a Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国人民银行副行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as a Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中央纪委国家监委驻中国人民银行纪检监察组组长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission stationed at the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 中央纪委国家监委驻中国人民银行纪检监察组

zh-cn: 中央纪委国家监委驻中国人民银行纪检监察组
中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会驻中国人民银行纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会、中华人民共和国国家监察委员会设在中国人民银行的派驻机构。
description.en: The dispatched agency of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China and the National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China stationed at the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行的前身之一，1948年与北海银行、西北农民银行合并组建中国人民银行。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the People's Bank of China, which merged with Beihai Bank and Northwest Farmers Bank in 1948 to form the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行的前身之一，1948年与华北银行、西北农民银行合并组建中国人民银行。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the People's Bank of China, which merged with Huabei Bank and Northwest Farmers Bank in 1948 to form the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行的前身之一，1948年与华北银行、北海银行合并组建中国人民银行。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the People's Bank of China, which merged with Huabei Bank and Beihai Bank in 1948 to form the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on the People's Bank of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一部确定中国人民银行为中央银行的法律。
description.en: A law of the People's Republic of China that establishes the People's Bank of China as the central bank.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，即中央人民政府。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, i.e., the Central People's Government.

en: Constituent Department of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成机构，负责管理国家某方面工作的行政机关。
description.en: A constituent body of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, an administrative organ responsible for managing a certain aspect of national work.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中国人民银行委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中国人民银行委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中国人民银行的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China within the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第一次国共内战期间建立的苏维埃政权。
description.en: A soviet regime established by the Communist Party of China during the First Chinese Civil War.

nodes.id: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行

zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行
en: National Bank of the Chinese Soviet Republic

description.zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国的国家银行，被视为中国人民银行的前身。
description.en: The state bank of the Chinese Soviet Republic, considered the predecessor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly referred to as China.

description.zh-cn: 中国河北省的省会，中国人民银行的成立地。
description.en: The capital city of Hebei Province, China, and the place where the People's Bank of China was founded.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有商业银行之一，其部分业务由原中国人民银行分拆而来。
description.en: One of China's major state-owned commercial banks, with some of its business spun off from the original People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有商业银行之一，其部分业务由原中国人民银行分拆而来。
description.en: One of China's major state-owned commercial banks, with some of its business spun off from the original People's Bank of China.

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有商业银行之一，成立于1984年，承接了原由中国人民银行办理的工商信贷和储蓄业务。
description.en: One of China's major state-owned commercial banks, established in 1984 to take over the industrial and commercial credit and savings business originally handled by the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 第八届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第八届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第八届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The eighth term of the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一，提议筹建中国人民银行。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who proposed the establishment of the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国财政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管国家财政收支、财税政策等事务。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national fiscal revenue and expenditure, fiscal and tax policies, etc.

nodes.id: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国务院直属正部级事业单位，负责监管银行业金融机构。其职能由中国人民银行分离而出。
description.en: Formerly a ministerial-level public institution directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for regulating banking financial institutions. Its functions were separated from the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 国家金融监督管理总局

zh-cn: 国家金融监督管理总局

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属机构，负责统一监管除证券业之外的金融业。承接了中国人民银行的部分监管职责。
description.en: An institution directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the unified supervision of the financial industry except for the securities sector. It has taken over some regulatory responsibilities from the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会

zh-cn: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会

description.zh-cn: 原国务院统筹协调金融稳定和改革发展重大问题的议事协调机构，其办公室曾设在中国人民银行。
description.en: The former deliberative and coordinating body of the State Council for coordinating major issues of financial stability, reform, and development, whose office was once located in the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 中央金融委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央金融委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 中共中央金融委员会的办事机构，承接了原国务院金融稳定发展委员会办公室的职责。
description.en: The working body of the Central Financial Commission of the CPC Central Committee, which has taken over the responsibilities of the former office of the State Council's Financial Stability and Development Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民银行首任行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, the first Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾代理中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Acting Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理，并曾兼任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council, who also served concurrently as Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行党委书记、副行长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Party Committee Secretary and Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院部委管理的国家局，由中国人民银行管理。
description.en: A state administration managed by a ministry or commission of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, administered by the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 1948年12月1日，以华北银行为基础，合并北海银行和西北农民银行组建中国人民银行。
description.en: On December 1, 1948, the People's Bank of China was established based on Huabei Bank, through the merger of Beihai Bank and Northwest Farmers Bank.

description.zh-cn: 1948年12月1日，以华北银行为基础，合并北海银行和西北农民银行组建中国人民银行。
description.en: On December 1, 1948, the People's Bank of China was established based on Huabei Bank, through the merger of Beihai Bank and Northwest Farmers Bank.

description.zh-cn: 1948年12月1日，以华北银行为基础，合并北海银行和西北农民银行组建中国人民银行。
description.en: On December 1, 1948, the People's Bank of China was established based on Huabei Bank, through the merger of Beihai Bank and Northwest Farmers Bank.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门之一。
description.en: The People's Bank of China is one of the constituent departments of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行是国务院组成部门之一。
description.en: The People's Bank of China is one of the constituent departments of the State Council.

relationships.source: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行的前身是中华苏维埃共和国国家银行。
description.en: The predecessor of the People's Bank of China was the National Bank of the Chinese Soviet Republic.

relationships.target: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1931年在中华苏维埃共和国成立了中华苏维埃共和国国家银行。
description.en: The Communist Party of China established the National Bank of the Chinese Soviet Republic in the Chinese Soviet Republic in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 根据董必武的提议，中共中央于1947年10月决定筹备建立中国人民银行。
description.en: Based on the proposal of Dong Biwu, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided in October 1947 to prepare for the establishment of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 1983年9月，国务院决定成立中国工商银行，以承办原由中国人民银行承担的工商信贷和储蓄业务。
description.en: In September 1983, the State Council decided to establish the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to take over the industrial and commercial credit and savings business previously handled by the People's Bank of China.

relationships.source: 第八届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法

description.zh-cn: 1995年3月18日，第八届全国人民代表大会第三次会议通过了《中华人民共和国中国人民银行法》。
description.en: On March 18, 1995, the Third Session of the Eighth National People's Congress passed the 'Law of the People's Republic of China on the People's Bank of China'.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国中国人民银行法》以法律形式确立了中国人民银行为中央银行。
description.en: The 'Law of the People's Republic of China on the People's Bank of China' legally established the People's Bank of China as the central bank.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国财政部

description.zh-cn: 1970年6月，财政部与中国人民银行合并，至1977年11月两机构分设。
description.en: In June 1970, the Ministry of Finance and the People's Bank of China merged, and the two institutions were separated in November 1977.

relationships.target: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 2003年，中国人民银行对银行、金融资产管理公司、信托投资公司及其他存款类金融机构的监管职能被分离出来，成立了中国银行业监督管理委员会。
description.en: In 2003, the regulatory functions of the People's Bank of China over banks, financial asset management companies, trust and investment companies, and other deposit-taking financial institutions were separated to establish the China Banking Regulatory Commission.

relationships.source: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会

description.zh-cn: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会办公室曾设在中国人民银行，并接受其直接领导。
description.en: The office of the State Council's Financial Stability and Development Committee was located in the People's Bank of China and was under its direct leadership.

relationships.source: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会
relationships.target: 中央金融委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 根据2023年《党和国家机构改革方案》，原国务院金融稳定发展委员会办公室职责划入中央金融委员会办公室。
description.en: According to the 2023 'Plan for the Reform of Party and State Institutions', the responsibilities of the former office of the State Council's Financial Stability and Development Committee were transferred to the office of the Central Financial Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中国人民银行委员会
中央纪委国家监委驻中国人民银行纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命初期去职。
description.en: Left office in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中国人民银行委员会
中国共产党中国人民银行委员会
中国共产党中国人民银行委员会

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局由中国人民银行管理。
description.en: The State Administration of Foreign Exchange is managed by the People's Bank of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中国人民银行委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中国人民银行委员会是中国共产党在中国人民银行内设立的领导机构。
description.en: The Party Committee of the People's Bank of China is the leadership body established by the Communist Party of China within the People's Bank of China.
